title: Morgans readies Wagners for equity raising
text:
Construction materials company Wagners is set to go cap in hand to investors.

The company is expected to seek to raise about $40 million in a rights issue via stockbroker Morgans.

Funds raised will be used to help repair its balance sheet and accelerate growth in the United States.

Street Talk. Peter Braig

The deal is expected to launch on Monday.

Importantly, the Wagner family shareholders, who together own about half of the company's shares on issue, are expected to tip fresh funds in as part of the offer.
description: Construction materials company Wagners is set to go cap in hand to investors.
